user_query: I'm organizing a company event in San Francisco. Can you fetch historical figures associated with San Francisco? Additionally, estimate the market value of my car with the VIN number '5J6RE4H71BL123456' and its ownership cost for the next 5 years. Lastly, recommend some hotels near the Moscone Center for our stay.

TaskList.description: Fetch historical figures associated with San Francisco.
Estimate the market value of the car using the provided VIN number and calculate ownership cost for the next 5 years.
Recommend hotels near the Moscone Center in San Francisco.
